solution_line_template: Maci pays {num_blue_pens} * ${blue_pen_cost} = $<<{num_blue_pens}*{blue_pen_cost}={blue_total}>>{blue_total} for the blue pens.
She pays {num_red_pens}*${red_pen_cost} = $<<{num_red_pens}*{red_pen_cost}={red_total}>>{red_total} for the red pens.
To buy all the pens she needs, Maci pays ${red_total_dollars}+${blue_total_dollars}= $<<{red_total_dollars}+{blue_total_dollars}={total_cost}>>{total_cost}
